Description.enUS:
Warrior Hero, adept at offensive combat and disrupting enemy troops. Can learn Storm Bolt, Thunder Clap, Bash and Avatar.

Attacks land units.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders your units to move to the target area while ignoring enemy units and attacks. Issuing a move order onto a target unit will cause your unit to follow the target using move orders.
Orders your units to stop whatever order they were previously given. Units that have been told to stop will attack enemy units and move to engage nearby enemies.
Orders your units to stand where they are and attack units that are within range. When on Hold Position your units will not chase down enemy units that run away, nor move to engage ranged attackers.

Orders your units to continually move from their current position to the targeted area until given another command. Units on patrol will move to engage enemy units that come within range. Issuing a patrol order onto a target unit will cause your unit to imitate the targeted unit's behavior.

Orders your units to move to the target area and attack any enemy units they see on the way. If you order them to attack a specific unit, your units will ignore other enemy units and will attack the targeted unit until it is destroyed.

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1
Opens the abilities menu and allows you to assign unused points to the Heroes' abilities.
Stops the unit from auto-acquiring enemies, allowing it to Shadowmeld and remain unseen at night.

Teleports the Hero and any of its nearby troops to your highest level town hall, or a friendly town hall if you don't have one.

Consumes x1.
Throws a magical hammer at a target enemy unit, dealing 100 damage and stunning the target for 5 seconds.
Slams the ground, dealing 60 damage to nearby enemy land units and slowing their movement by 50% and attack rate by 50%.
Gives a 20% chance that an attack will do 25 bonus damage and stun an opponent for 2 seconds.

Activate Avatar to give the Mountain King 5 bonus armor, 500 bonus hit points, 20 bonus damage and spell immunity.
Lasts 60 seconds.
Drops the current un-issued order and allows you to select a different order.

A magical hammer that is thrown at an enemy unit, causing damage and stunning the target.

Level 1 - 100 damage, 5 second stun.
Level 2 - 225 damage, 5 second stun.
Level 3 - 350 damage, 5 second stun.

Slams the ground, dealing damage to and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

Level 1 - 60 damage, 50% move, 50% attack.
Level 2 - 100 damage, 50% move, 50% attack.
Level 3 - 140 damage, 50% move, 50% attack.

Gives a chance that an attack will do 25 bonus damage and stun an opponent for 2 seconds.

Level 1 - 20% chance per attack.
Level 2 - 30% chance per attack.
Level 3 - 40% chance per attack.

When Avatar is activated, it gives the Mountain King 5 bonus armor, 500 bonus hit points, 20 bonus damage and spell immunity.
Lasts 60 seconds.

- Each point increases hit points by 25
- Each point increases hit point regeneration

- Every 3 points increase armor by 1
- Each point increases attack speed

- Each point increases mana by 15
- Each point increases mana regeneration
Orders your units to move to the target area while ignoring enemy units and attacks. Issuing a move order onto a target unit will cause your unit to follow the target using move orders.
Orders your units to stop whatever order they were previously given. Units that have been told to stop will attack enemy units and move to engage nearby enemies.
Orders your units to stand where they are and attack units that are within range. When on Hold Position your units will not chase down enemy units that run away, nor move to engage ranged attackers.

Orders your units to continually move from their current position to the targeted area until given another command. Units on patrol will move to engage enemy units that come within range. Issuing a patrol order onto a target unit will cause your unit to imitate the targeted unit's behavior.

Orders your units to move to the target area and attack any enemy units they see on the way. If you order them to attack a specific unit, your units will ignore other enemy units and will attack the targeted unit until it is destroyed.
Stops the unit from auto-acquiring enemies, allowing it to Shadowmeld and remain unseen at night.

Teleports the Hero and any of its nearby troops to your highest level town hall, or a friendly town hall if you don't have one.

Gives a 20% chance that an attack will do 25 bonus damage and stun an opponent for 2 seconds.

Activate Avatar to give the Mountain King 5 bonus armor, 500 bonus hit points, 20 bonus damage and spell immunity.
Lasts 60 seconds.
